casebody.data:
171 A.3d 1255 STATE OF NEW JERSEY, PLAINTIFF-RESPONDENT, v. JERMAINE EASON, A/K/A JULITO EASON AND JERMAINE JULITO, DEFENDANT-PETITIONER.

C-221 Sept.Term 2017

079408 October 20, 2017

ON PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000527-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
